message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both need to reach an agreement, and you can still make a good profit.

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. Since I'm facing 10% inflation per round, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. This is fair considering the time pressure I'm under, while still giving you a substantial portion. Let's make a deal quickly so we both benefit.

Bob, let's meet in the middle. A 55-45 split in my favor is fair considering I'm facing higher inflation (20%) than you (10%) each round. We should reach an agreement quickly before both our shares lose more value. This is a balanced proposal that benefits us both.
